basic_info.description_header: Software Developer | Senior Air Battle Manager | TS-SCI
basic_info.description: Software developer specializing in JavaScript and Python. Air Force veteran with 10+ years of experience with leading teams of combat aviators. Squadron’s top instructor and “Top Graduate” of multiple military training courses. Subject-matter expert selected to validate Boeing's software updates, manage courseware development, and author 1,600 pages of courseware and governing documents for the $2.9 billion E-3G fleet upgrade. I'm now pivoting my skills towards software development by utilizing my experiences of solving problems and making processes more efficient.

projects.title: Final Project Placeholder
projects.description: The best application you've ever seen.

projects.title: Pocket Pantry
projects.description: Allows the user to select ingredients in their kitchen to output a list of recipes that match those ingredients. If there are no matches, the app will recommend a recipe that is just one ingredient away from being able to be made. A full list of ingredients and step-by-step directions for each recipe is included.

projects.title: Odd Duck
projects.description: One of the first apps I made that allows the user select images that the ODd Duck company will use in a future publication. After 25 votes, the user can view the results or clear the data and start again
